response.overview: After his revival in a hospital morgue, Jason fixes his vengeful attention on the Jarvis family and a group of hitherto carefree teenagers.
response.tagline: Three times before you have felt the terror, known the madness, lived the horror. But this is the one you've been screaming for.
response.title: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
